div.bibl: Svenska Nyheter, Apr. 25, 1905. NEW BUILDING CONSTRUCTIONS

body.p: Permits for the erection of new buildings,here in the city and suburbs, were issued last week to the following Scandinavians:
J. W. Johnson, two-story brick house, 6125 S. Green Street; estimated cost, $4,000.
Emil Youngren, two-story frame house, 2292 N. Irving Avenue; estimated cost, $3,200.
Ernst Winge, two-story frame house, 1760 N. Claremont Avenue; estimated cost, #3,000.
Emil Erlandson, two-story brick house, 5759 S. May Street; estimated cost, $4,000.
A. Wickstrom, two-story brick house, 5726 Peoria Street; estimated cost, $2,500.
N. Anderson, one and one-half-story frame house, 1432 N. Lawndale Avenue; estimated cost, $1,800.
